attributes.action: Implement a written or codified constitution for the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
The UK currently has an uncodified constitution which is confusing and ambiguous - making it difficult for citizens to understand.
This leaves the political system open to abuse.
attributes.background: I want the Government to change the current uncodified constitution to a written codified constitution.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700677
